Quincy.G. H. Bent Company: The G.H. Bent Company, better known as Bent's Cookie Factory, is a business specializing in cookies that has been operating in Milton, Massachusetts, since 1801. Bent's also sells a number of other baked goods, including their George and Martha Washington pies (both have powdered sugar on the top, the George with a cherry filling, and the Martha with a lemon filling). In addition, Bent's has expanded its menu to include a variety of delicious sandwiches all of which are named after a Milton-based theme.
